definition: a slow mode of locomotion on hands and knees or dragging the body, to move slowly
details:
noun
- a slow mode of locomotion on hands and knees or dragging the body
= example: a slow mode of locomotion on hands and knees or dragging the body
= synonyms: crawling, creep, creeping
- a very slow movement
= example: a very slow movement
- a swimming stroke
= synonyms: breaststroke, front crawl
verb
- to move slowly
= synonyms: creep
- to swim by doing the crawl
- to show submission or fear
= synonyms: creep, fawn, cringe, cower, grovel
- to be full of
= example: to be full of
- to feel as if crawling with insects
= example: to feel as if crawling with insects
